mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum cnt, a.* FROM (SELECT af.APVNO, af.TITLE, af.writer, af.WEMPNO, emf.ENAME||' / '||df.DNAME manager, aaf.MEMPNO, af.REGDTE, af.sts FROM APPROVE_F af, approveadmin_f aaf, EMP_MASTER_F emf, DEPT_F df WHERE af.apvno = aaf.apvno AND aaf.mempno = emf.EMPNO AND emf.DEPTNO = df.DEPTNO AND af.wempno = #{wempno} AND af.sts = #{sts} AND af.title like '%'||#{title}||'%' ORDER BY APVNO DESC) a ) WHERE cnt BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum cnt, a.* FROM (SELECT af.APVNO, af.TITLE, af.writer, af.WEMPNO, emf.ENAME||' / '||df.DNAME manager, aaf.MEMPNO, af.REGDTE, af.sts FROM APPROVE_F af, approveadmin_f aaf, EMP_MASTER_F emf, DEPT_F df WHERE af.apvno = aaf.apvno AND aaf.mempno = emf.EMPNO AND emf.DEPTNO = df.DEPTNO AND aaf.mempno = #{mempno} AND af.sts = '대기' AND af.title like '%'||#{title}||'%' ORDER BY APVNO DESC) a ) WHERE cnt BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT af.APVNO, af.TITLE, af.writer, af.WEMPNO, emf.ENAME||' / '||df.DNAME manager, aaf.MEMPNO, af.REGDTE, aaf.ckdte, af.sts, aaf.feedback , af.content FROM APPROVE_F af, approveadmin_f aaf, EMP_MASTER_F emf, DEPT_F df WHERE af.apvno = aaf.apvno AND aaf.mempno = emf.EMPNO AND emf.DEPTNO = df.DEPTNO AND af.apvno = #{apvno} ORDER BY APVNO DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum cnt, a.* FROM (SELECT rf.rskNO, rf.TITLE, rf.writer, rf.WEMPNO, rf2.cempno, rf2.finalDTE, rf.sts, rf2.priority FROM RISK_F rf, RISKADMIN_F rf2 WHERE rf.rskno = rf2.rskno AND rf.wempno = #{wempno} AND rf.sts = '발생예정' AND rf.title like '%'||#{title}||'%' ORDER BY rskNO DESC) a ) WHERE cnt BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum cnt, a.* FROM (SELECT rf.rskNO, rf.TITLE, rf.writer, rf.WEMPNO, rf2.cempno, rf2.finalDTE, rf.sts, rf2.priority FROM RISK_F rf, RISKADMIN_F rf2 WHERE rf.rskno = rf2.rskno AND rf2.manager = #{manager} AND rf.sts = '발생예정' AND rf.title like '%'||#{title}||'%' ORDER BY rskNO DESC) a ) WHERE cnt BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum cnt, a.* FROM (SELECT rf.rskNO, rf.TITLE, rf.writer, rf.WEMPNO, emf.ENAME||' / '||df.DNAME charge, rf2.cempno, rf2.finalDTE, rf.sts, rf2.priority FROM RISK_F rf, RISKADMIN_F rf2 , EMP_MASTER_F emf, DEPT_F df WHERE rf.rskno = rf2.rskno AND rf2.cempno = emf.EMPNO AND emf.DEPTNO = df.DEPTNO AND rf2.cempno = #{cempno} AND rf.sts = '처리중' AND rf.title like '%'||#{title}||'%' ORDER BY rskNO DESC) a ) WHERE cnt BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum cnt, a.* FROM (SELECT rf.rskNO, rf.TITLE, rf.writer, rf.WEMPNO, emf.ENAME||' / '||df.DNAME charge, rf2.cempno, rf2.finalDTE, rf.sts, rf2.priority FROM RISK_F rf, RISKADMIN_F rf2 , EMP_MASTER_F emf, DEPT_F df WHERE rf.rskno = rf2.rskno AND rf2.cempno = emf.EMPNO AND emf.DEPTNO = df.DEPTNO AND (rf.wempno = #{wempno} OR rf2.cempno = #{cempno}) AND rf.sts = '완료' AND rf.title like '%'||#{title}||'%' ORDER BY rskNO DESC) a ) WHERE cnt BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT rf.rskNO, rf.TITLE, rf.writer, rf.WEMPNO, rf.regdte, emf.ENAME||' / '||df.DNAME charge, rf2.cempno, rf2.finaldte, rf.sts, rf2.priority, rf2.probability, rf2.danger, rf2.manager, rf.content, rf2.feedback FROM RISK_F rf, RISKADMIN_F rf2 , EMP_MASTER_F emf, DEPT_F df WHERE rf.rskno = rf2.rskno(+) AND rf2.cempno = emf.EMPNO(+) AND emf.DEPTNO = df.DEPTNO(+) AND rf.rskno = #{rskno} ORDER BY rskNO DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum cnt, a.* FROM (SELECT mf.METNO, mf.TITLE, mf.METDTE, mf.wempno, emf.ENAME||' / '||df.DNAME writer, mf.regdte FROM MEETING_F mf, EMP_MASTER_F emf, DEPT_F df WHERE mf.wempno = emf.EMPNO AND emf.DEPTNO = df.DEPTNO AND df.DEPTNO = #{deptno} AND mf.title like '%'||#{title}||'%' AND 1=1 ORDER BY mf.METNO DESC) a ) WHERE cnt BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meeting_f values(met_seq.nextval,#{title}, to_date(#{metdteStr},'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_date(#{metdteStr}||'T'||#{starttmStr}||'+09:00','YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI"+09:00"'), to_date(#{metdteStr}||'T'||#{fintmStr}||'+09:00','YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI"+09:00"'), #{participant}, #{wempno}, #{content}, #{conclusion}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT mf.METNO, to_char(mf.METDTE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') metdteStr, to_char(mf.STARTTM, 'HH24:MI') starttmStr, to_char(mf.finTM, 'HH24:MI') fintmStr, mf.regdte, mf.wempno, emf.ENAME||' / '||df.DNAME writer, mf.PARTICIPANT, mf.TITLE, mf.content, mf.conclusion FROM MEETING_F mf, EMP_MASTER_F emf, DEPT_F df WHERE mf.wempno = emf.EMPNO AND emf.DEPTNO = df.DEPTNO AND metno = #{metno}
